title: How come when I try to specate a friends game, the option is blacked out?
body: Is spectator mode disabled at the moment? Why, and how long until it comes back until it does?

replies.body: I'm not seeing any current issues with spectating, so I'm curious if your friend wasn't actually in a game any longer and the client was just kind of confused. Do me a favor and try refreshing your client to see if that helps. It could also be connection related preventing you from having a strong enough signal to watch the live game, so go ahead and check out the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.
